item.title: Creating Free Tier AWS Account With Free S3 Storage Account
item.author: Kunj Sangani
item.description: Introduction In this article, we will go through the step by step process of creating an AWS account and using their free tier services such as Amazon S3. To create a free AWS account follow the below steps, Step 1 Navigate here. Step 2 To check the details of what services are available in the free tier scroll at the bottom which would list all the free services available. Please note that the free services are only allowed for 12 months and are only intended for understanding the AWS services.
